content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Monday, June 23rd, 2025 

Today is a “A” Day  

 Girls’ volleyball open gym will be held after school today from 3-5.  There will be NO open gym on Wednesday 

 Congratulations 8th graders!  

 Lunch today is waffles, hashbrowns, sausage, fresh fruit and vegetables.
